title: 高频率红石发射器
txt_content:
这是新人我第一次发帖，多多包涵吧
先放一个沙子四周放红石火把
[img]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/1418522154/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/(AkV%25CXK[Y%25OW@YA)_T(D.jpg[/img]
再在一个红石火把上放发射器 ，其余放沙子
[img]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/1418522154/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/H%60W75@]W(S%60E%60@ZMA[(F(WR.jpg[/img] 
在发射器的右面放一个沙子上面放红石火把
[img]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/1418522154/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/PL0[L7@%25$HE%7B%7B%25RDH$HAUZN.jpg[/img] 
最后在中间的沙子上放红石，就完成了
file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/1418522154/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/~EFYJA%25(V@%7BNASQ9AVEOQPQ.jpg
还可以在右边的沙子上放操纵杆 ，扳一下就关了
[img]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/1418522154/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/7KL[A%60U%7B67~6~9_7D)18_3F.jpg[/img]
